title: Twisted Cornett
contents: subtitle | Wondrous Item, Instrument, Major, Uncommon (Requires Attunement)

text | You can use an action to play this cornett in the typical manner. The cornett emits sound in a 30-foot cone that is audible 30 feet away. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of your next turn. Creatures who succeed on their saving throw have their speed reduced by 10, to a minimum of 0.
text | Once you use the cornett in this way, it cannot be used again until the next dawn.
text | Proficiency grants proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument.
text | See the Tool Proficiencies entry for more information.
text | Proficiency with a musical instrument indicates you are familiar with the techniques used to play it. You also have knowledge of some songs commonly performed with that instrument.
description | History | Your expertise aids you in recalling lore related to your instrument.
description | Performance | Your ability to put on a good show is improved when you incorporate an instrument into your act.

description | Compose a Tune | As part of a long rest, you can compose a new tune and lyrics for your instrument. You might use this ability to impress a noble or spread scandalous rumors with a catchy tune.
